_sText:
Original Map by : IzzehO 
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/21277

I felt that the map was terrible the way he had it. So I decided to change up KEY features and add special effect.

The objective of Murderball is to MURDER the other team by knifing the balls like soccer mod, you aim them at the other team and try to stay alive.

Its pretty easy to pick up and a lot of fun with many people.


Video I made for the map, was made about 2 years ago.
